lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter said the United States no longer faced one threat at a time, but an array of opponents, as he previewed the Pentagon’s budget request for 2017.

headline.print_headline: Pentagon Chief Says U.S. Is Facing Array of Threats
headline.main: Pentagon Chief Calls for Spending Increase to Address Multiple Threats

snippet: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter said the United States no longer faced one threat at a time, but an array of opponents, as he previewed the Pentagon’s budget request for 2017.
abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter says nation faces 'dramatically different' array of threats to its security than it has seen in quarter-century, including Islamic State and Russia; calls for federal budget increase in military spending to $582.7 billion.
